OfxImageEffectContext.OfxMessage: Significant color differences exist in your source and target images. Color matching may not work as expected.

The target image does not contain sufficient color variation. Color matching may not work as expected.
The source and target images do not contain sufficient color variation. Color matching may not work as expected.
The source image is a solid color. Color matching will not be applied.
The target image is a solid color. Color matching will not be applied.
The source and target images are solid colors. Color matching will not be applied.
Please select a target image for comparison with the source image.
Please select a target image for comparison with the preset.
